page.title: Athens Airport
page.content: Our Athens airport station is located right next to the airport. One of our representatives is waiting for you at the arrivals hall and escorts you to our shuttle bus. From there you are transported to our station. On your way back, our shuttle bus will again move you to the departure halls. We are open and waiting for you 24/7 all year round. You can find our station on Google maps by clicking here.
